net.codemusic.smartears
Interface ISettings

All Known Implementing Classes:
SettingsManager
public interface ISettings

This interface represents a class that is responsible for storing the user's current preference settings

Field Summary
static int ASCENDING
          Indicates that answers should be played from low to high
static int DESCENDING
          Indicates that answers should be played from high to low
 
Method Summary
 int getDelay()
          Returns an int representing the number of ticks between the start of the notes of an IAnswer
 int getDuration()
          Returns an int that represents the number of ticks each note lasts
 javax.sound.midi.Instrument getInstrument()
          Returns the current MIDI instrument that is used to create the timbre
 int getPlayMode()
          Returns the current play mode - either ASCENDING or DESCENDING
